p.k: The Échenard and Duperrex families, are the changes sustainable?
p.d: Six months have passed since the Échenard and Duperrex families adopted new consumption and mobility methods and they are impatient to discover the results of their efforts. But a final challenge remains, and it is a big one: to reduce the CO2 emissions of their homes. Directed by: Yann-Olivier Wicht (Switzerland, 2018)
